Name: Battle Imagine - Olvera
Description:
Activates or advances Olvera's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Flash Execution.

Arcane! Flash Execution
Summons Olvera to shuttle back and forth forward, gathering enemies along the path and dealing Attack Damage. When dealing DMG, there is a chance to inflict Seed of Lightning on the targets for 10s. Dealing DMG to targets with Seed of Lightning will cause an explosion (CD: 2s), dealing Magic Damage. Any defeated target with Seed of Lightning will reduce CD time by 20s.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
